text: Stanley Meadows (born 14 July 1931 in Stepney, London, England) is a British film and television actor. He graduated from RADA in 1955. Meadows made frequent appearances in British films and became something of a stalwart of British television series including Public Eye, Undermind, Randall and Hopkirk and Widows (Eddie Rawlins).BFI.org ==Selected filmography== * The Mummy (1959) * Payroll (1961) * A Prize of Arms (1962) * Panic (1963) * Clash by Night (1963) * The Masque of the Red Death (1964) * The Ipcress File (1965) * You Must Be Joking! (1965) * The Night Caller (1965) * Kaleidoscope (1966) * The Terrornauts (1967) * The Fixer (1968) * Performance (1970) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:British male film actors Category:British male television actors Category:Alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art
title: Stanley Meadows
